repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a commentary by Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara on the Taittirīya Upaniṣad. There is a note before the front folio mentioning title and other information. it says "Taittirīyopaniṣaddvitīyapraśnabhāṣya Bhaṭṭabhāskara No 33 96 pages 7 lines Grantha".

msItem.title: Taittirīyopaniṣaddvitīyapraśnabhāṣya
msItem.author: Bhaṭṭabhāskara
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 atha puruṣasaṃskārārthsnānavacanādimantrāgnihotrādiśrautopakārakāratayā asmin prapāṭhake āmnātānāḥ eṣāṃ liṃgādinā viśeṣaviniyogonviṣyaḥ eṣāṃ
1v 2 sūtrakrameṇa vidhiriti nyāyenākalpyovidhiḥ . ayaṃ samasta praśno yājñikya upaniṣad ucyante . yajñātmanā bhagavannārāyaṇena dṛṣṭatvāt . devatāśca tat sanāmnyaḥ tatra prathame nuvākeṣu ādyātmaviṣayāḥ .
msItem.explicit:
49r 5 vakāraṇāt parasya braḥmaṇo mahimā na vāpnoti evaṃ samāpītasūtrārthāvākyAvṛttiḥ brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārthaṃ sarvopividvānabhijayati ityupaniṣa (2-3 syllables broken as folio is damaged.) 49r 6 meva …… iti bhaṭṭabhāskaraviracite jñānayajñākhye yajurvedabhāṣye yājñikiṣūpaniṣatsu catuṣṣaṣṭītamonuvākaḥ ….. samāptaḥ prapāṭhakaḥ …..
49r 7 atha śrautriyaṃ kāṇḍamārabhyate . āraṇyakatvādasmin pradeśe mantrabrāhmaṇayorāmnātaṃ tatrādau śāntimupaya (gap of 1 syllable due to damage.) namo vā? ca

extent.measure: 2 guard folio and 49 written No blank folios.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil nuemrals in thte left margin.

additions.desc: On 1v Śubamastu hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin.

listBibl.bibl: Taittirīya Āraṇyakam of the Kṛṣṇayajurveda with the commentary of Bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśra Vol 2 prapāṭhaka 5 to 6 Edi. By A Mahādevaśāstri and Panditaratna K Raghavacarya Government Oriental Library Series, Bibliothica Sanskritika no. 27 Mysore Government Branch press 1902 .(Vols are available on archive org.) (Published under the Authority of the Government of His Highness Maharaja of Mysore. )

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
